code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import{useSelector}from"react-redux";;var PageActionInitialState={loading:false};var PageActionModule=createSlice({name:'pageAction',initialState:PageActionInitialState,reducers:{setLoading:function setLoading(state,action){return action.payload;}}});export var usePageAction=function usePageAction(){return useSelector(function(state){return state;});};export default PageActionModule;
